NO_PERMISSIONS:
You don't have sufficient permissions to use this command.
Execution requires the permission(s): **${permissions}**.
SUPPORT_SERVER: You can receive help for this bot at ${serverInvite}.
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hey, thank you for adding me to your server. Here are a few important things you should do before I work to my full extend as well as the configurations I set myself based on the guild options.
COMMUNITY_SERVER_MESSAGE: Because this server is set as Community Server, Authorization Codes are enforced. To learn about authorization codes, please visit ${url}.
BASE_SETTINGS_MESSAGE:
For me to fully work, you need to set a logs channel. You can view a list of settings with `${command}`. 
This also shows the command you need to use to view/modify that certain setting.
LANGUAGE_SUPPORT_MESSAGE: I have language support! You can view all supported languages and their codes with `${command}`. All languages are community contributed, so there may be missing entries which will be shown in English. If you wish to contribute, you can get information with `${command}`.
NEW_PREFIX: The command prefix has been set to **`${newPrefix}`**.
NEW_LANGUAGE: The language has been set to **${newLanguage}**.
AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES:
The following languages are available: **${languages}**
To choose a language, please use the language code (**`en`** as example)
CURRENT_SETTING: The setting **`${setting}`** is currently set to **`${value}`**.
NEW_SETTING: The setting **`${setting}`** has been set to **`${value}`**.
INVALID_SETTING: The value **`${value}`** is invalid for this setting.
EMBED_TEMP_BAN_MODERATOR_DESCRIPTION: The user **`${user}`** (`${userId}`) has been temporarily banned.
EMBED_TEMP_MUTE_MODERATOR_DESCRIPTION: The user **`${user}`** (`${userId}`) has been temporarily muted.
EMBED_NOTE_MODERATOR_DESCRIPTION: The user **`${user}`** (`${userId}`) has received a notice.
EMBED_STAFF_NOTE_MODERATOR_DESCRIPTION: The user **`${user}`** (`${userId}`) has received a staff note.
EMBED_BAN_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got banned from the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_UNBAN_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got unbanned from the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_TBAN_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got temporarily banned from the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_KICK_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got kicked from the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_STRIKE_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got striked on the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_UNMUTE_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got unmuted on the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_MUTE_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got muted on the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_TMUTE_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You got temporarily muted on the server **${serverName}**.
EMBED_NOTE_MODERATED_DESCRIPTION: You received a notice on the server **${serverName}**.
INVALID_AUTH_CODE: You provided an invalid authorization code.
CONFIRM_ACTION: Please confirm this action within the next ${time} seconds with `${command}`.
USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The user you specified does not exist on Discord.
USER_ALREADY_BANNED: The user **`${user}`** is already banned here.
USER_NOT_BANNED: The user **`${user}`** is not banned here.
USER_NOT_IN_GUILD: The user **`${user}`** is not a member of this guild.
NO_OFFICIAL_BAN_RECORD: This user had no official ban record in my database, so I did a simple unban.
UNABLE_TO_NOTIFY_USER: I was unable to notify the user. Either they have closed DMs, blocked me or don't share any servers
CASE_CREATED: I have created this users case and performed any additional actions required with it.
CASE_REVOKED: I have revoked this users case and any additional actions taken with it.
CASE_DELETED: I have deleted this users case and revoked any additional actions taken with it.
TIME_NOT_IN_THE_FUTURE: The time you gave me must be atleast 30 seconds into the future.
COMMAND_BAN_INFO: You are about to ban the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_TEMP_BAN_INFO: You are about to ban the user **`${userTag}`**. They will be unbanned **`${when}`**.
COMMAND_UNBAN_INFO: You are about to unban the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_KICK_INFO: You are about to kick the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_STRIKE_INFO: You are about to strike the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_MUTE_INFO: You are about to mute the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_TEMP_MUTE_INFO: You are about to mute the user **`${userTag}`**. They will be unmuted **`${when}`**.
COMMAND_UNMUTE_INFO: You are about to unmute the user **`${userTag}`**.
COMMAND_NOTE_INFO: You are about to give the user **`${userTag}`** a note.
COMMAND_STAFF_NOTE_INFO: You are about to give the user **`${userTag}`** a staff note.
COMMAND_REVOKE_INFO: You are about to revoke the case with id **`${caseId}`**.
